metadata.name: Suspicious WindowsTerminal Child Processes
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious children spawned via the Windows Terminal application which could be a sign of persistence via WindowsTerminal (see references section)

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\windowsterminal.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\wt.exe'))) AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\rundll32.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\regsvr32.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\certutil.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\cscript.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\wscript.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\csc.exe'))) AND (contains(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\users\\public\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\downloads\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\desktop\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\appdata\\local\\temp\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\windows\\temp\\'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' iex ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' icm')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('invoke-')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('import-module ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ipmo ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('downloadstring(')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /c ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /k ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /r '))) AND NOT (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('import-module')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('microsoft.visualstudio.devshell.dll')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('enter-vsdevshell')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\appdata\\local\\packages\\microsoft.windowsterminal_')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\localstate\\settings.json')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('c:\\program files\\microsoft visual studio\\')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\common7\\tools\\vsdevcmd.bat'))))

output.summary: Detects suspicious children spawned via the Windows Terminal application which could be a sign of persistence via WindowsTerminal (see references section)

metadata.objective: False positive: Other legitimate "Windows Terminal" profiles References: https://persistence-info.github.io/Data/windowsterminalprofile.html, https://twitter.com/nas_bench/status/1550836225652686848
